Important insect pest/disease on each crop and their control measure in details A. Pest of major crops of the State and their control measures

Rice Rice stem borer • Apply carbofuran 3 G 1.0 kg a.i./ha or Carptape 4 G @ 1.0 kg/100 sq. meter at 5 days after sowing and five days before transplanting in paddy nursery. • Application of carbofuran 3 G 1.0 kg a.i./ha or Carptape 4 G @ 1.0 kg/ha or carbosulfan 5 G @ 1.0 kg a.i//ha at 30 and 50 days after transplanting • Spray any one of these Phosphomedon 0.03 % or Endosulfan 0.07 % or Quinalfos 0.05 % or Phosalone 0.05 % Paddy leaf hopper/Jassid • Avoid the top dressing of nitrogen application and Drain the water from the field • Later stage of the crop, spray Imidacloprid 0.05 % or Fenobucarb 0.07 % Rice hispa and rice blue • Collect the adults and destroy bittle • Summer ploughing • Spray any one of these Endosulfan 0.07 % or Carbaryl 0.02 % or Methyl Parathion 0.05 % or Fenitrothion 0.05 % Rice grass hopper • Deep ploughing before rain • Dust any one of these, Carbaryl 10 % or Methyl Parathion 2 % or Quinalphos 1.5 % @ 20-25 kg/ha Blister beetle • Carbaryl 10 % dust @ 20 kg/ha 30
